iti101:2.1: “Cattarimani, bhikkhave, appani ceva sulabhani ca, tani ca anavajjani.
iti101:2.3: Pamsukulam, bhikkhave, civaranam appanca sulabhanca, tanca anavajjam.
iti101:2.4: Pindiyalopo, bhikkhave, bhojananam appanca sulabhanca, tanca anavajjam.
iti101:2.5: Rukkhamulam, bhikkhave, senasananam appanca sulabhanca, tanca anavajjam.
iti101:2.6: Putimuttam, bhikkhave, bhesajjanam appanca sulabhanca tanca anavajjam.
iti101:2.7: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari appani ceva sulabhani ca, tani ca anavajjani.
iti101:2.8: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appena ca tuttho hoti sulabhena ca anavajjena ca, idamassaham annataram samannanganti vadami”ti.
iti101:5.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
